# castai_ai_optimizer_api_key (Resource)

CAST AI AI Optimizer API Key resource to manage AI Optimizer API keys



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the API key.
- `organization_id` (String) CAST AI organization ID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The generated API key token.
